::Aerotaur::
    He tries to move out of the way but the four shots hit his left thigh.  
He probably would've fallen except that he was still in the air.  "Thank you 
for the assistance."  He shouts at Axis.  "But this is my vendetta.  I would 
appreciate it if you helped the others."  He flies at Deemos again.  The left 
side of his body hanging limp.  He fires an eight shot barrage out of his 
right arm cannon.
